version_description:
- Upgraded bookings can now select their seats in the app
- Resolved an issue where the Standby & Upgrade list did not appear on some Air Canada Express booked flights
- Replaced the distance and duration that was not appearing in Flight Status for Booked flights
- Fixed the 'Use NEXUS for U.S. check-in' bug, so that it now works more reliably
- Bug fixes and improvements across the entire app

- Based on your feedback, we've provided easier access to 'My Flights' from the home screen. Let us know what you think!
- Resolved an issue that prevented names with hyphens or apostrophes from completing bookings with their Aeroplan number.
- Under the hood improvements, and bug fixes to keep the app running smoothly.
Please update your app to take advantage of the latest bug fixes and improvements.

- Preference to open boarding pass in app (as opposed to Wallet) will now be respected
- Resolved various bugs and issues

- Get notified of your baggage carousel right when you land. Enable this from the Flight Notifications menu within your Booked or Tracked flight, or from Menu > Settings > Notifications. This feature is in beta, and we’re in the process of rolling this out. More airports will be available soon.
- Altitude members: Get ready to Earn Your Wings!
- Updated the display of the city list in Booking and Flight Status to show more information.
- Resolved an issue where the electronic boarding pass would sometimes disappear in the app.
- Added Vegetarian Jain as a meal preference. Add it to your Air Canada mobile+ profile, or select it as your meal preference at time of booking.
- Updated the 'Baggage, lost & found' section of 'Assistance' to reflect the latest details.
- General housekeeping of smaller bugs and issues.

- Improved performance to keep your bookings and flight status information up-to-date.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes across the board.

- You can now have your electronic boarding passes sent to the same email address or mobile phone number. Great for families travelling together!
- Resolved an issue which prevented the printable boarding pass link from opening correctly.
- Restored missing confirmation pop-ups that broke in iOS 11.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.

- Support for iPhone X.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.
- Fixed a bug in the calendar which prevented 2018 dates from being selected.

- You can now track your flight’s inbound flight status. Select “Track inbound plane” from a flight in 'My Flights' or from Flight Status details.
- Completed trips will now be automatically removed from 'My Flights' 24 hours after their arrival.
- Addressed an issue that would cause the app to crash on startup. Thanks to all those who reported this issue!
- Continued to improve the calendar date selection in the booking flow.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.

- Tell us about your flight, and let us know how we're doing from the new post-flight survey tile. The tile is available on your home screen for completed flights for up to 24 hours.
- Our app is gearing up for the Olympics by featuring some of Team Canada’s athletes. #FlyTheFlag
- Addressed an issue which causes the app to crash at start for languages other than English or French. Sorry about that!
- Keeping the app running smoothly by fixing some miscellaneous smaller bugs and issues.

Multiple Passenger Boarding Pass Support
- We've overhauled the in-app boarding passes with a new look.
- As always, your boarding passes are stored for offline use.
- Access them at any time from the Menu, from the new dedicated Boarding Pass section.
- Support for multiple passengers' boarding passes, just swipe to scroll through passengers.
- Flight status information is now built it. Tap on it to reveal more information about your flight.

Altitude 2018
- Updated our digital Altitude cards with a fresh coat of paint for 2018.

This app release also contains general bug fixes and smaller enhancements to keep it running smoothly on your journey to your next destination.
- Fixed a bug that cropped up in our last release. Thank you to everyone who reported it. If you're still experiencing issues, please report it via the app or e-mail us at mobile@aircanada.ca.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.

- Fixed an issue with the date selector in Booking and Flight Status.
- Resolved an issue which prevented the app from automatically updating the Altitude card in Wallet with the new 2018 design.

- Bid for an upgrade on eligible flights from the AC Bid Upgrade home tile or via Manage Booking in 'My Flights'.
- Altitude members: it’s time to Earn Your Wings! Be on the lookout for the Spring 2018 edition beginning on April 5th.
- The home screen now features some of our most popular destinations. Let us help you get there!
- This release contains general bug fixes and smaller enhancements to keep the app running smoothly on the journey to your next destination.

- Introducing bookings in USD: You can now book, select seats, change, and cancel bookings in US dollars. We’ll default to your device’s region, but you can set your currency from Menu > Settings > Preferences.
- Preview the seat map and see your seat assignment for bookings which do not offer seat selection in the app. (Reminder: The app allows seat selection for bookings made on aircanada.com, the mobile app, or AC Reservations.)
- AC Globe and UATP Support: Pay throughout the app using your UATP card as the payment method. You can also save it to your Air Canada mobile+ profile for quick purchases.
- The app will now tell you which flight notifications you’re subscribed to from your Booked and Tracked flights.
- As usual, general bug fixes and smaller enhancements we don’t give enough credit to, but keep the app running smoothly on the journey to your next destination.
- Fixed a bug that cropped up in our last release. Thank you to everyone who reported it. If you're still experiencing issues, please report it via the app or e-mail us at mobile@aircanada.ca.

- On My Way travel assistance is now available for purchase when making a booking.
- Revised flight times and delays will now be indicated more clearly.
- “Create account” Home tile will no longer appear if you are already signed into mobile+.
- Some minor bug fixes to keep the app running smoothly.

- Have flights connecting through Canada? We've made it easy to know if you need to pass through Customs, Security, or if you need to collect your baggage. Find this information in your Booked Itinerary Details in 'My Flights'.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.

- Updated layover connection information for baggage and security.
- Improved the display of the currency on our travel options and fare details screens.
- The regular housekeeping items including smaller bug fixes, polish and improvements.
- General bug fixes and minor app enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.

- A new home tile will invite you to learn more about the Air Canada Signature Suite when travelling on an eligible booking. We hope to see you there soon!
- Fixed an issue which could cause the app to quit unexpectedly at start up. Thanks to all who reported, if you’re still experiencing this issue, please let us know by writing mobile@aircanada.ca.
We’ve added a new home screen tile to show you the next available Maple Leaf Lounge on your trip, or help you purchase lounge access so that you can see what you’ve been missing.
General bug fixes and improvements to keep the app running smoothly.
General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.

- Movies should now play properly when connected to the in-flight entertainment system. Sorry about that!
- Other miscellaneous bug fixes and enhancements.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- Updates to flight status now include more detailed information about departure delays and cancellations.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.
- General bug fixes and enhancements to keep the app running smoothly.

This is a maintenance release to address some issues related to the removal of Air Canada mobile+ profile.
• Temporarily removed the Altitude Digital Card feature.
• Various fixes related to improving the experience post-Air Canada mobile+.

Please note:
• You can still add your Aeroplan number at time of booking or check-in.
• Your boarding passes still contain your Aeroplan, Altitude, and Star Alliance information, and can be used throughout the airport, including at Air Canada Maple Leaf and Star Alliance lounges.
• Stay tuned for app updates which will include our new log in experience.

The all new Air Canada app has arrived! See our App Store description to learn more about what's new.

Please note: Your bookings, tracked flights, and boarding passes from earlier versions of the app will not be migrated into the new app.

- Addressed a few issues found after our last app release.

Thanks to all those who reported them to us!
- Addressed a few under-the-hood issues to improve the stability of the app.
In this release, we've fixed a few critical bugs and made some performance and stability improvements.

Version 5.1 brings back some favourite features, and includes several enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for your patience and support.

NEW
• We've reintroduced the Altitude Digital Card. In addition to viewing the card in the 'Aeroplan' tab, your priority contacts are also now available from the 'Customer support' section.
• NEXUS card is back. Save your NEXUS information to your saved traveler profile, and have it automatically added to your check-in to/from the United States.

FIXED
• Resolved an issue which prevented the 'Check-in' button from appearing on the 'Trips' tab. The button should now appear when check-in opens, and disappear once everyone is checked-in or check-in closes.
• Addressed an issue which prevented access to the 'Boarding Pass' directly from 'Trips' for some customers. The boarding pass is now available right from the 'Trips' tab, at the bottom of the screen.
• We also tidied up a bunch of bugs to improve the performance and stability of the app.

IMPROVED
• Improved the reliability of bookings automatically retrieved by Aeroplan. This should resolve the issue of bookings disappearing, and also allows for redemption bookings to be automatically retrieved and saved.
• Customers without a booking saved in the app can now use their Aeroplan number to check in from the 'More' tab. Your booking and boarding pass will be saved automatically after check-in.

Thank you for your feedback and comments on our v5.0 release. Enable automatic updates, or check back often as we update the app regularly with new features, enhancements, and bug fixes.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

Version 5.2 brings back some favourite features, and includes several enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for your patience and support.

We've introduced 3 new cards to the 'Overview' tab of each booking in 'Trips':

1. The 'Flight status' card, which will appear if your upcoming flight is affected by a delay or cancellation within 3 days of departure.
2. The 'Check-in' card, which presents itself when it's time to check-in.
3. The 'Seats' card, which provides access to a summary of selected or assigned seats across your upcoming flights, and reminds you to select your seats in case you haven't yet.

This release also includes:
• Seat assignment, meal, and flight status information incorporated into each flight's details in Trips.
• Easy access to your boarding pass from every tab of the app.
• Fixes to a number of bugs to improve the stability and performance of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

This version (v5.2.1) resolves an issue which prevented v5.2 from launching for some customers when updating from an earlier version of the app.

Version 5.2 brings back some favourite features, and includes several enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for your patience and support.

We've introduced 3 new cards to the 'Overview' tab of each booking in 'Trips':

1. The 'Flight status' card, which will appear if your upcoming flight is affected by a delay or cancellation within 3 days of departure.
2. The 'Check-in' card, which presents itself when it's time to check-in.
3. The 'Seats' card, which provides access to a summary of selected or assigned seats across your upcoming flights, and reminds you to select your seats in case you haven't yet.

This release also includes:
• Seat assignment, meal, and flight status information incorporated into each flight's details in Trips.
• Easy access to your boarding pass from every tab of the app.
• Fixes to a number of bugs to improve the stability and performance of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

Version 5.3 brings back more favourite features, and includes several enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for your patience and support.

• Saved Payment Methods: You can now use your saved payment and billing information from your Aeroplan account in the app. Manage your cards from the Aeroplan tab > 'Payment methods' menu.
• Face ID and Touch ID: Before making a purchase with your saved payment card, we'll ask you to confirm your Aeroplan account password. To make this easier, you can now enable Face ID or Touch ID from Aeroplan tab > 'Password and security' menu to use your face or fingerprint instead.
• Manage Check-In: We've added a button on your Trip details screen to quickly return to check-in, so that you can add an extra bag, change your seat, or standby early - quickly and easily.
• Boarding Pass List Improvement: The list of boarding passes has been re-ordered, so that your upcoming boarding passes appear at the top of the list. On your day of travel, your boarding passes are still quickly accessible from the bottom of each tab of the app.
• With every update, we fix a number of bugs to improve the stability and performance of the app.


Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

Version 5.4.1 continues to build out features based on our customers' feedback, and also includes enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for your patience and support.

• Onboarding: Take a quick tour of features in our new app. We'll keep this section updated as new features become available, so stay tuned!
• Calendar Sync: Add your flights to your device's calendar, and keep events automatically updated with changes. Enable this feature from the More tab > Settings > Calendar sync section to get started.
• Trip Details: Jump right into your flight's details from the 'Trips' tab. Tapping each flight will now open that flight's details directly.
• Clear Recents: Clear your recent booking and flight status searches. Press the button at the end of the 'Recent searches' row on the 'Book' and 'Flight status' tabs to clear your history.
• Saved Payments Improvements: We've improved the performance and experience around retrieving and updating saved payment details.
• With every update, we fix a number of bugs to improve the quality, and stability of the app.


Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

Version 5.4.1 continues to build out features based on our customers' feedback, and also includes enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for your patience and support.

• Schedule changes: We've made it easier to identify and review pending schedule changes to your upcoming flights.
• With every update we fix a number of bugs to improve the quality, and stability of the app. In this release we've also made some optimizations to reduce the size of the app.


Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you on board again soon. Version 5.6 of the Air Canada app includes new features based on our customers' feedback, as well as enhancements and bug fixes.

• Improvements to flight status: Added baggage carousel, entertainment guide, meal information, and more.
• Improvement to Trips: See the status of your existing eUpgrade request.
• With every update we fix a number of bugs to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

As part of our commitment to health and safety, v5.6.1 of the Air Canada app introduces digital menus for customers travelling in Air Canada Signature Class, Business Class, Premium Economy and Economy Class on flights where meals are served.

• Find the menus within the 'Meals' section of flight status.
• If you have your booking saved in the app, we'll automatically download and store your menu for offline use.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you on board again soon.

Version 5.7 introduces two new features that we're excited to share with you.

• Introducing 'Home' tab: Your new Air Canada hub where you'll find relevant and contextual information for your upcoming trips. This is our first iteration, and based on your feedback, we will be expanding on the content and experience in upcoming updates.
• Seat map preview: See seat availability and aircraft layout before you buy or fly. Now accessible while making a booking or anytime within Flight Status, the seat map is back with some enhancements including full-aircraft view. In a future update, we'll also offer the ability to select seats within the app - stay tuned!
• Bug fixes to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? What do you think of the new 'Home' tab? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.8 of the Air Canada app includes new features based on our customers' feedback, as well as enhancements and bug fixes.

• Bid for an upgrade: Take advantage of the 'AC Bid Upgrade' program from the 'Overview' tab of your Trip details. You can now also use your Aeroplan miles to place your bid!
• Disrupted bookings: We've made it easier to identify and review bookings which have been disrupted by flights which are no longer operating or pending itinerary changes.
• Updated colours: Applied a fresh coat of paint to make text and buttons easier to read.
• Bug fixes to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section on the More tab.

Loving the app? Don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.9.1 of the Air Canada app has backend support for the redesigned Aeroplan program arriving on November 8th - and we cannot be more excited about it!

In addition to the preparations for launch, this version also includes bug fixes to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section of the More menu.

We hope you're enjoying our regular updates to the app. Please don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version v5.9.2 of the Air Canada app welcomes you to the redesigned Aeroplan program.

• New onboarding: New screens added which introduce you to core Aeroplan features in the app.
• eStore, Cars & Hotels: We've added links on the 'Aeroplan' tab to easily access the Aeroplan eStore, as well as the car rental and hotel websites.
• Booking with Family Sharing: Resolved the issue which prevented booking for more than one passenger when that member was a part of a family.
• As usual, we include bug fixes in every update to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.


Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section of the More menu.

We hope you're enjoying our regular updates to the app. Please don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.10 of the Air Canada app includes mostly behind-the-scenes enhancements to improve the reliability and stability of the app. Among them, you'll most notably see:

• Booking calendar: Our date selection calendar is no longer stuck on October 2021, and you can now book up to 353 days in advance again.
• Boarding pass updates: Your boarding pass will now automatically update if you've made a change to your check-in using the app, like purchasing an upgrade, or selecting a different seat.


Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section of the More menu.

We hope you're enjoying our regular updates to the app. Please don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.11 of the Air Canada app is our last update of 2020 and includes new features based on our customers' feedback, as well as enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for your Loyalty.

• Aeroplan digital card: Now available for all members. Access it from the 'Aeroplan' tab, or by tapping your name at the top of the 'Home' tab. On compatible devices, you can also save the Aeroplan card to your Apple Wallet.
• Call Aeroplan: Need help with your Aeroplan booking? Aeroplan customer support numbers are now available from the 'Customer support' section.
• As usual, we include bug fixes in every update to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section of the More menu.

We hope you're enjoying our regular updates to the app. Please don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon. Have a happy and safe holiday season and new year.

Version 5.12 of the Air Canada app includes new features based on our customers' feedback, as well as enhancements and bug fixes.

• Aeroplan sign in: We've updated our sign in system to provide a seamless experience when accessing certain web-based features in the Aeroplan dashboard such as selecting Aeroplan Elite benefits, and eUpgrades. We'll continue to improve this experience over time. During this transition, you will need to sign in again - but don't worry, this is only one time, and your Aeroplan password remains the same.
• Canadian Travel Number: Add your Canadian Travel Number at time of booking, or save it to your Aeroplan profile and the app will automatically add it to your bookings.
• Wi-Fi indicator: Based on your feedback, we've added the Wi-Fi indicator back to Flight Status so that you can quickly identify if your upcoming flight offers Wi-Fi. We've also made it easier to learn how to connect to Wi-Fi directly from Flight Status.
• As usual, we include bug fixes in every update to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.


Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section found in the Home tab menu.

Loving the app? Don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.13 of the Air Canada app includes new features based on our customers' feedback, as well as enhancements and bug fixes.

• Starbucks Partnership: Now you can earn and redeem Aeroplan points with Starbucks by linking your accounts. Go to the 'Aeroplan' tab to get started.
• As usual, we include bug fixes in every update to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section found in the Home tab menu.

Loving the app? Don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.14 of the Air Canada app includes new features based on our customers' feedback, as well as enhancements and bug fixes.

• Aeroplan Elite members can now redeem their Status Pass benefit directly in the app.
• As usual, we include bug fixes in every update to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Loving the app? Don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.15 of the Air Canada app includes new Aeroplan program features, as well as enhancements and bug fixes.

• Aeroplan members can now reach Aeroplan 25K Status via eligible every day purchases. Track your Everyday Status Qualification (EDQ) progress directly from the ‘Aeroplan’ tab.
• Aeroplan Status Passes that have been gifted to you will now appear in the corresponding booking’s details.
• As usual, we include bug fixes in every update to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section found in the Home tab menu.

Loving the app? Don't forget to rate us 5 stars and leave a review!

We hope you're all staying safe and healthy, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon.

Version 5.16 of the Air Canada app includes new features based on our customers' feedback, as well as enhancements and bug fixes.

• You can now sort flight results by time, price, duration or stops to create your ideal itinerary.
• As usual, we've included bug fixes to improve the quality, performance, and stability of the app.

Do you have a suggestion or idea? Did you see a bug or something that isn't working correctly? You can reach us through the 'Customer support' section found in the Home tab menu.
